title: Did a Drunken Sailor Use a Raccoon to Bypass an Ignition Interlock?
subtitle: A humorous viral police report claimed a drunk Navy petty officer used a raccoon to bypass an ignition interlock system installed in his vehicle.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A Navy officer was arrested for "abuse of public animal" and "drunken or reckless driving" after he used a raccoon to bypass an ignition interlock system.
